name: DODO (NBG)
description: Dodo is a puzzle pizza hunting simulator where you help the red sausage - shaped creature named Dodo find the way to his favourite meal. Dodo certainly likes dancing, because he moves and spins in a particular pattern which often don't lead to vitory. You can alter his movement pattern by placing stop signs on the level. Press LMB to place a stop sign (if you have any) and RMB to remove it. Then press play or SPACE to see how Dodo heads towards his doom step by step. However, Dodo's demise is not a part of intended experience, so feel free to restart with R whenever you feel like it. Have fun!
